Job Posting:165655 - Position: S25 Software Developer Intern (Professional Services) 165655B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/19/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 02/07/2025 05:07 PM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Coveo 3175 des Quatre-Bourgeois, Suite 200 Quebec City G1W 2K7 QC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 Software Developer Intern (Professional Services) 165655B Co-op Position Various Locations Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Locations (apply thorugh the different links below) • Montreal, QC • Quebec City, QC Ready to turn complex technical challenges into concrete success for customers? Our Professional Services team collaborates closely with Coveo clients to ensure a seamless integration, and configuration of our highly customizable AI Cloud SaaS Solution into their environment. They work with prestigious customers such as Nespresso and Metro. On a day-to-day basis, you'll be actively involved in every step of the process, from design to production, working closely with customers to understand their needs and deliver tailored solutions. You'll do more than just code-you'll be deploying and implementing your work with the customer. If you excel in front-end technologies and are eager to integrate your technical expertise into consultancy while tackling business problems at scale, the Professional Services team is the perfect fit for you! What your typical day would look like: You start your day off with a team meeting (scrum) to track the progress on the team's different projects and learn by sharing • innovative ideas. It's a key for idea sharing and inspiration. • Following that, you get to work on an internal tooling project to make your colleague's jobs easier and more efficient. Each contribution you make here has a direct impact on the productivity of your colleagues. • Next, you work on the teams' backlog of tasks by conducting bug fixes and ongoing projects. • After lunch, you attend client meetings with your colleagues. You update them on your progress, discuss next steps and contribute to future implementations. • You have a check-in meeting with your mentor to get some feedback on what you have been working on and take the opportunity to shadow what they are doing. Here's what will qualify you for the role: Third-year or fourth year student studying computer science or software engineering at the Bachelor or Master's level. • • At least one internship in a front-end or full-stack role already completed: you're ready to build on that experience and take your skills to the next level. • Excellent frontend coding skills: you have experience in languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Angular, Python, or Java. • Strong communication skills: you will meet with our global customers. • Creative problem-solving: you excel at problem-solving and always look for ways to improve processes with fresh ideas and innovative approaches. And the cherry on top that will make you stand out: Interest in a consultancy role. • • Participated in programming competitions like hackathons or worked on relevant side projects. A curiosity-driven mindset - never afraid to ask questions and always eager to learn! • You don't need to check every single box; passion goes a long way and we appreciate that skills are transferable. Send us your application, we want to hear from you! Join the Coveolife! We encourage all candidates to apply regardless of, for example, age, gender, disability, gaps in CV, national or ethnic background. #LI-hybrid Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
